data.author: Dirk Mika

changelog.release_notes:
New levels (now 60!) added.
You can now choose from three level of difficulty.
1. Easy: the same level as before
2. Normal: slightly faster ball, you need 300 points for an extra live (instead of 250), no Solid2Normal Blocks powerup.
3. Hard: even faster ball, you need 400 points for an extra live, no Solid2Normal Blocks powerup.

Demo Mode added. Wait 7 seconds after launching the app to see a short demo.

Power-Ups are animated when they fall. (Pebble Time and Pebble Time Round only)

App-Icon and settings icons fixed on classic Pebble.

Added compatibility for Pebble Time Round
Added highscore
Added ability to reset a game.
Increased number of balls and power-ups simultaneously visible.

- Pebble Time ready
- New PowerUps added
    - 1UP (adds a live)
    - Shield (ball bounces at floor)
    - Solid2Normal (turns solid blocks into normal, breakable blocks)
- A PowerUp is dropped if no block has been hit for more than 15 seconds
- Speed (Ball) and duration of PowerUps slightly tuned.
- New block type. Drops a PowerUp on hit.
- Animations slightly modified.
- Displays number of lives left (top right corner)
- Display FPS (if enabled in settings) instead of number of lives.
- App renamed due to trademark issues. (Pebble 'kindly' asked my to do so)

- Compatible with Pebble Firmware v2.0
- Now settings are saved.
- Game ist paused on receiving a notification
- Game is saved when you quit the app.
- New Option to keep backlight on while game is running
- New Option to turn on "sound" (vibrations)

data.description:
This is an arkanoid-clone for your pebble.

Control:
'up' - move left
'select' - start / pause game, (enter settings on long press)
'down' - move right

There are eight different kind of 'power-ups':
1. extra ball 
2. slow ball
3. fast ball
4. 'power'-ball (destroys blocks without being reflected)
5. missile launcher (automatically launches missiles from your paddle)
6. shield (ball bounces at floor)
7. Solid2Normal (turns solid block into normal, destroyable blocks)
8. 1UP (adds an extra live)
